title: Interest in US law schools is surging as AI makes payoff less certain
description: More students are applying to law school as a career hedge. However, they face increased costs and new federal loan limits. The rise of artificial intelligence also poses uncertainties for future legal jobs and salaries. This presents a significant challenge for a new generation of aspiring legal professionals.

title: New UCLA AI tool targets Alzheimer's cases often missed in early diagnosis
description: Researchers at UCLA are harnessing the power of artificial intelligence to help identify who's at risk of Alzheimer's disease.
content:
LOS ANGELES (KABC) -- Researchers at UCLA are harnessing the power of artificial intelligence to help identify who's at risk of Alzheimer's disease.

title: Odisha aims to become harbinger of AI tech: CM

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Odisha Aims to Lead with Cutting-Edge AI Ecosystem
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. title: This AI tool is going viral. Five ways people are using it.
description: Claude Code, an artificial intelligence tool that can generate computer code when people type a prompt, is having a viral moment. The tool, which the AI startup Anthropic introduced in May, has shown record growth over the past two weeks, the company said, without sharing its data. title: Motley Fool: Powering artificial intelligence
description: Nvidia (Nasdaq: NVDA) may be the most well-known artificial intelligence and semiconductor stock on the planet. The tech giant makes the graphics processing units (GPUs) that fuel top AI tasks such as the training of large language models (LLMs), or inferencing – when an AI model applies that training to answer a question or solve a problem. Nvidia’s early entrance into the AI market gave it a huge advantage, and its focus on innovation has kept it in the top spot.

title: Will skills, not degrees, decide who stays employable in the AI era?
description: As artificial intelligence becomes embedded in everyday work, the debate around jobs is shifting from fear of replacement to readiness for change. Experts say India’s ability to stay competitive in the AI era will depend less on technology adoption and more on how quickly its workforce can reskill.
